summary: Trump Tower is a 58-story, 664-foot-tall building in New York City. It's a mix of offices, shops, and homes. Donald Trump, the former U.S. president, lives and works there. The tower was built in the 1980s on the site of a famous store. It had some controversies during construction. After Trump became president, the tower became even more popular, but security was a big concern.
title: Trump Tower
